version_description: Resolves crash on open issue for iOS 6 users.
Adds support for Apple Watch.

- Dramatic improvements to VoiceOver navigation.
- Numerous improvements around alerts.
- Users with invalidated listings lineups will be prompted to relocalize rather than giving a "grid failed to load" error.
- Many other minor bug fixes and improvements.

- Significant improvements to performance and availability of the app in situations where your device does not have internet access.
- Numerous performance improvements.
- Added support for iPad Pro.
Fixes crashing introduced in 5.0.5
Bug fixes and security updates.
Bug fixes and security updates.
We’re constantly updating TV Guide to improve your experience. To make sure you don’t miss any of our updates, make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!
We've fixed some bugs, improved performance issues, and the overall experience. As we’re constantly updating TV Guide to improve your experience, please make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!

We’ve fixed some bugs and a few pesky crashes, improved performance and experience. As we’re constantly update TV guide to improve your experience, please make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!

We’ve fixed the annoying alert issues you may have experienced, as well as fixed the Facebook login.
You can opt to set alerts for new episodes on air for your favorite shows!
We’ve also refreshed our TV Listings page to improve both performance and experience. As we constantly update TV Guide to improve your experience, please make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!
We've improved the TV Listings page performance and experience. As we constantly update TV Guide to improve your experience, please make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!

You may now choose to limit our ads tracking within app by updating your settings. As we constantly update TV Guide to improve your in-app experience, please make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!

We’ve improved our limit ad tracking opt-in option, which can be managed within your settings.

As we constantly update TV Guide to improve your in-app experience by introducing new and progressing on existing features, please make sure to keep your auto-updates turned on!

We've updated the alerts functionality to notify you every time a new episode is available on TV’s Service Provider Listings. To enable the alerts for new episodes or programs in your Listings, simply add the episode or program to your Watchlist directly from your Listings. You may edit the show’s alert to alert you for all episodes by editing the alert type from the episode or program page.
We also fixed the Antenna Service Provider selection issues some of you were experiencing, make sure your TV Guide location services are enabled under your device settings.

We're constantly improving our notifications so we can keep you posted about big TV moments and the best holiday binges.
To ensure you get our latest updates, please keep your auto-updates & notifications turned on!

Hey fam, thanks for your patience. A lot has been updated this time, including a bug which caused unexpected exits when you attempted to filter listings. Plus we improved video so that full-screen view works as intended, and you can now sign in using Facebook or email without any pesky issues. Now: what're we gonna watch next?

Plus we improved video so that full-screen view works as intended, and you can now sign in using Facebook or email without any pesky issues. Now: what're we gonna watch next?

"It's finally here! We are proud to present the brand-new TV Guide iOS App. TV Guide has always been the No. 1 source for finding what to watch and where to watch it on live TV. Now, we've overhauled everything to establish streaming as a first-class citizen in the app, while making live TV listings better than ever.

Top new features include:
- More new shows & movies from an expanded catalog of 30+ streaming services and hundreds of channels
- Immediate view of your favorite channels so you don't need to scroll to see what's on the networks you watch the most
- Enhanced Watchlist with a quick view of all the shows and movies coming soon, plus what's available to stream now
- Trailers! Need we say more?
- And most importantly, Quick Watch: a one-tap way link to the best streaming options for any show or movie, without having to hunt the web

And lastly, we appreciate your loyalty over the years, and we're excited for you to use our new product. There may be some rough edges at launch, and we humbly ask for your feedback, good or bad. We're listening, we'll respond, and we'll make changes to help the TV Guide App become the TV companion you deserve. Thank you!"

Fixed empty cells on Listings grid after registration
Fixed bug where external links did not properly open the app
Fixed crashes after launching the app, finishing onboarding, and adding to Watchlist
Removed Watchlist error after onboarding
Fixed login error messaging
Listings grid performance improvements
Listings provider is automatically selected if one wasn't previously selected
Added default tab selection in settings
Added quick filters to Listings grid (Movies, Sports, News, Kids)
Added a settings icon to all tabs
Added an error when attempting to merge a Facebook or Apple account to an email account (support for account merging is coming soon!)
Added images to notifications
Added the ability to change zip code in settings if location detection is enabled

Fixed bug where a default provider replaced linked cable providers
Added Upcoming Airing Details module on Program Page
Added warning when the listings grid shows few HD channels
Fixed crash after restoring the WiFi network
Fixed crash after the Watchlist is set as the default tab

Default provider no longer replaces linked cable provider
App no longer crashes on launch after setting a service provider
Added Upcoming Airing Details on Program Page
Fixed a crash that occurred when the user restored the WiFi network
Fixed errors that occurred on the Listings tab when filtering to HD channels
Default provider now correctly appears in Settings for anonymous users
Fixed a loading error that occurred on Discover programs without images
Improved Listings loading animation reliability
Airings in Where to Watch now show future airings only
Default tabs now work correctly
Fixed issue with some missing providers
Minor bug fixes and improvements
Improved scroll performance of listings grid
